last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 8
last_episode_to_air.overview: Season 6 ends with Brace trying to pull out, but the guys give him major heat for being premature. Meanwhile, Bradley gets lapped by his date; and Ash can't stop scratching.

name: Gigolos
overview: Make a date with the Gigolos. An extremely rare and uncensored look into the personal and professional lives of five hot guys in Vegas who like to hang out, have fun and get girls, but in their case they get paid for it. They find themselves in some unexpected positions as they balance relationships, friends and family with the demands of their female clientele. A reality series like no other, Gigolos is not only provocative but also surprisingly heartfelt. It's a wild ride for these real-life escorts who never miss a trick.

episodes.name: Date Night
episodes.overview: In the Season 1 premiere, a group of Las Vegas gigolos competes for the business of a wealthy older woman. Manager Garren James hires his newest escort, Vin, and explains the business. Nick has a date with a teacher from out of town. Jimmy services a married woman for her birthday as her husband watches and offers encouragement. An older woman interviews the men to choose one to escort her to a Black and White Ball. The men bet on who she will choose and Steven wins. The boys welcome Vin to their ranks.

episodes.name: All 4 One
episodes.overview: Steven, needing money to send his son to summer camp, books two new clients, including a very large woman he connects with through Jimmy. The rest of the guys visit a psychic and Brace is particularly affected by her reading. Later the four decide to service a client simultaneously and turn over their combined fee to Steve. Despite instituting a "no fluids or skin touching but the client's" rule, once at the client's place Brace is unwilling to participate. Steven is grateful for their gesture.

episodes.name: Release the Kraken!
episodes.overview: Brace wants to transition from escort to entrepreneur with an anti-aging dietary supplement but after a meeting with a supplement company he realizes he has much more work to do. Nick meets with a new client who tries to push him past his limits. Jimmy's new client is a budding dominatrix who outfits him with a "cock cage" that he wears for several days.

episodes.name: Three Gigolos and a Baby
episodes.overview: A married couple hires Nick to service the wife as a trade-off for the wife's hiring a woman for her husband. She enjoys herself but her husband is uncomfortable with the situation. Jimmy cooks dinner for his girlfriend Kelly, whom he told about his escorting career after a month together. Later two of his college friends come to town for a bachelorette party. One has kids and she leaves them with Nick, Vin and Steven. Brace begs off baby-sitting by saying he has a client but in reality he treats himself to a spa day. Jimmy tells his friends that he escorts and they are both supportive.

episodes.name: Dance Dance Gigoloution
episodes.overview: Jimmy reports that Kelly has broken up with him, jealous of the women he services. The guys do a photo shoot to update the Cowboys4Angels website. Brace's growing guilt and unease over being a gigolo lead him to seek solace, first from a priest, then from a female former escort. Jimmy and a client have sex in a limousine. A client hires Vin to dance with her in a salsa competition and they take third place.

episodes.name: Birthday Sex
episodes.overview: Steven reminds the guys that they have forgotten his birthday. To make it up to him they take him to a shooting range and then to a go-kart track but he remains morose. Finally they set him up with a regular client of Jimmy's and, during their session, surprise him with a cake which he then has sex with at the client's request. Jimmy has an appointment with an executive in her office. Nick experiences some stomach problems so Brace takes him to get a colonic, which Nick does not enjoy.

episodes.name: One Shot, One Opportunity
episodes.overview: Nick gets a chance to perform his original rap song for a music producer. The producer is impressed and wants to work with him in Los Angeles. Brace teaches a shy housewife how to be more aggressive for her husband. Steven meets a new client whose fetish is simulating being dead during sex. Vin's client wants the "boyfriend experience".

episodes.name: The Ties That Unbind
episodes.overview: In the Season 1 finale, Vin services a wife while her husband tapes them for their private pornography collection. Later he has relationship issues with his girlfriend, Leilani, when she asks him to move with her to Arizona. Fed up with Jimmy's slovenly ways and constant didgeridoo playing, Nick orders him to move out.

episodes.name: Gigo-loan
episodes.overview: In the Season 2 premiere, Brace is hired by an uninhibited 20-something for a wild marathon date; Vin helps ease the pain of a lonely woman; Jimmy copes with a personal crisis.

episodes.name: Get Down on the Strip
episodes.overview: Steven pleasures a client in public; Nick gears up for his first live rap performance; Jimmy must choose between coming through for a client or making it to his best friend's big night.

episodes.name: The Boyfriend Experience
episodes.overview: A woman confuses Steven's services for a real relationship; Brace faces the possibility of fatherhood; Vin considers asking his long-distance girlfriend to move in.

episodes.name: Really Smooth Operators
episodes.overview: Steven is reunited with his first girlfriend; the other guys explore a new "manscaping" technique; Brace grants a bucket list wish for a woman diagnosed with cancer.

episodes.name: Poker? Heck, Yeah I'll Poker
episodes.overview: Brace gets Botox injections before servicing a professional poker player. Vin is booked by a lesbian as a birthday present for her bisexual girlfriend and they have a threesome. Jimmy shoots a music video for Nick's song.

episodes.name: An Ex Marks the Spot
episodes.overview: Brace's ex-wife, her twin sister and her sister's ex-husband visit Brace, hoping he will be able to release the lingering anger from the marriage. Nick's client is a dominatrix who hires him to dominate her. Steven services the friend of a bride who refused his services at her bridal shower.

episodes.name: Giggle-O's
episodes.overview: Vin takes on a female bodybuilder as a client, then his mother visits for his birthday. Jimmy tries his hand at stand-up comedy. Initially he falters and attracts a heckler, but he rallies and starts getting laughs.

episodes.name: Brotherly Love
episodes.overview: Nick's brother visits Las Vegas and declares his interest in becoming a gigolo. Vin meets fellow escort and adult film star Zeb Atlas. Later he sacrifices sex with his girlfriend to be ready to service a client. Brace's appointment takes an unexpected turn when he discovers that his client is transgender.

episodes.name: The Steven Clown Affair
episodes.overview: Jimmy's future with the company is in jeopardy when he stops returning calls from his boss and fellow gigolos. Meanwhile, Brace gets his first spray-tan and Steven clowns around with a client.

episodes.name: Searching for a Fire Power
episodes.overview: Ash goes the extra mile with a fiery client to prove himself to his new co-workers. Brace takes a wild limo ride and Nick is uneasy about his client's creepy crawlers.

episodes.name: Ride Her, Cowboy
episodes.overview: Garren sends the gigolos to a dude ranch to mount-up and compete for a date with a rodeo champion. Ash and his date flush their inhibitions when things get hot and heavy at a restaurant.

episodes.name: Grin & Bear It
episodes.overview: After Nick injures Brace's back, Brace vows revenge. Vin helps a recent divorc√©e get back in the saddle, while Steven explores the art of "swing sex" with a client. Nick winds up in a hairy situation.

episodes.name: Courtesan Session
episodes.overview: Vin is hired by a voyeuristic couple to perform with two female escorts. Later, Vin meets the high-end ladies and their friends to discuss the female side of the escort business. Meanwhile, Nick plots his revenge on Brace and attempts to transform him into a not-so-Pretty Woman.

episodes.name: Spanks a Lot
episodes.overview: A wealthy client wants to meet all the guys to choose who she likes best. Ash attends a dominatrix class to prepare for a client with a kinky fetish. He then enrolls the rest of the guys so they can also learn the sensual art of domination.

episodes.name: Black Cock Down
episodes.overview: Darkness descends on Vegas when a client refuses to hire Vin because he is not "black enough." To please the client, Garren summons a new Gigolo to Vegas, which leads to a discussion on race amongst the guys. Meanwhile, Steven goes head-to-head with his nicotine addiction when Brace bets him $1,000 that he cannot quit smoking for one week.

episodes.name: A Decent Proposal
episodes.overview: Steven contemplates a long term job that would take him on a European tour. Vin is tasked with pleasuring a lesbian client who hasn't been with a man in years.

episodes.name: Lock, Stock & Two Swollen Testicles
episodes.overview: Steven is confronted by a client's jealous boyfriend. Ash's date teaches him some spicy salsa moves. Meanwhile, Brace considers undergoing a vasectomy.

episodes.name: Gigolos
episodes.overview: Season 3 finale. Brace decides to get testosterone injections and Nick considers going into the adult film industry.

episodes.name: Thank the Lords
episodes.overview: Season 4 premiere. A new gigolo comes to town and experiences a bit of an identity crisis. Meanwhile, Nick searches for just the right sound to ensure his latest track is a hit.

episodes.name: Bro-Choice
episodes.overview: While Brace is hired by a woman with a surprising past, Bradley reveals his gigolo lifestyle to his conservative, religious brother. Ash hits all the right notes with his classical violinist client.

episodes.name: The Spurt Locker
episodes.overview: Bradley enlists the help of the other gigolos when he is challenged by an experienced client to surpass her wildest fantasies. Ash and Brace heal their bodies and focus their minds during a spandex filled yoga session.

episodes.name: Make Mine a Double
episodes.overview: Brace is concerned about a woman's intentions when she hires both him and Nick. Ash teaches a new client the art of tantric sex, while Bradley learns that silence is golden.

episodes.name: Don't Judge a Gigolo by His Cover
episodes.overview: The gigolos compete in a test of intelligence to decide which guy will grace the cover of the new 'Cowboys 4 Angels' calendar. Nick's date challenges his alpha status while Brace becomes the light at the end of his client's tunnel.

episodes.name: Just for Licks
episodes.overview: Ash's life partner comes to town and her visit sparks a debate about the nature of open relationships. Vin turns to the dark side for a client's fantasy.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Nick meets a super fan and prepares for an appearance on the AVN's. Ash's date is rich in passion, while Vin's date is rich in calcium.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Vin and Ash consider designing their own cologne. Brace's client gets aggressive, while Nick gets an interesting request. Bradley's date wigs out.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Vin becomes a retired art teacher's muse. The gigolos shoot promo videos.

episodes.name: Creative Outlet
episodes.overview: Nick's date wants to clear some things up as Ash counsels a client with a troubled past. Meanwhile, Brace has some no-strings-attached fun. Season premiere.

episodes.name: Centaur
episodes.overview: Brace rewrites history when he's hired by a woman with a fetish for a bygone era. Ash searches for answers when he becomes a sleepless beauty.

episodes.name: Officer Nick Hawk
episodes.overview: While Vin takes it on the chin, Brace's kinder, gentler side encourages his client to spread her wings. Also, Nick shows off his private stache.

episodes.name: Rap Battle
episodes.overview: All rhyme and reason flies out the window when Nick challenges Vin to a rap battle. Meanwhile, Bradley gets ballsy on his date.

episodes.name: RIP Zeus
episodes.overview: The guys gather to support Brace, who is grief-stricken after hitting a ruff spot in life. Meanwhile, Bradley must mask his Southern charm and force himself into a new role to meet a client's dubious request.

episodes.name: Buff Bagwell
episodes.overview: Wrestling superstar Buff Bagwell wants to tag his way into the gigolo lifestyle. Ash sinks his teeth into a client's fantasy.

episodes.name: Pole a Palooza
episodes.overview: Nick learns to never challenge a stripper, while Vin takes a shot at a new business. Also, Brace gets his ass whupped.

episodes.name: Professor Brace
episodes.overview: The group begins a new chapter. Nick hustles to prep for a photo shoot.

episodes.name: Top Gun
episodes.overview: Bradley earns his wings when a date thrusts him into a fighter plane high above the Vegas skyline. And after shooting his mouth off, Nick must prove that he is the top gun of the crew in a marksmanship duel.

episodes.name: Vin Learns to Swim
episodes.overview: Nick goes overboard teaching Vin how to swim. Meanwhile, Brace goes commercial while Bradley deals with his baggage.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Vin has a special date where he must prove that good things can come in small packages. Plus, the guys meet one of the world's oldest professionals from the world's oldest profession, and Nick has a fight with a date.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Nick paints the town red. Brace gets roped into a strings-attached fantasy.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Brace helps Nick wrestle his boyhood dream into reality; Bradley takes care of a woman who has faced death; Ash gets shot by his date.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Brace goes nuts helping out a friend; Ash's client asks him to boldly go where no man has gone before.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Nick achy-breaks some hearts with his debut country track; Bradley and Brace prove they can clean up real nice for their dates; Vin serves up some family time when his brother comes to town.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Brace gets nervous when the new lady in his life has jewels on her mind; Nick's date becomes a liability, so he takes the extra step to ensure there are no holes in his protection.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Season 6 ends with Brace trying to pull out, but the guys give him major heat for being premature. Meanwhile, Bradley gets lapped by his date; and Ash can't stop scratching.
